summary: The diff implements all 10 requested feature showcases (REQ-13 through REQ-22) as new React components rendered from structured TypeScript data files. New components include RegistrationFlowCard, ListingCreationCard, HomeFeedMockup, SearchFilterMockup, ChatMockup, VerifiedBadgeMockup, FulfillmentOptionsCard, PaymentMethodsMockup, TrustSafetyMockup, and BoostedListingMockup. All are wired into FeatureBreakdownSection and MonetizationSection, and data is stored in frontend/src/data/features.ts and frontend/src/data/monetization.ts. The implementation appears comprehensive across all requirements.
